Class FuelGauge

java.lang.Object
  FuelGauge

public class FuelGauge
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the methods and fields to control the movement of a car's fuel gauge based on initial, min, and max fuel levels.

Version:
v2.0 Nov 1st, 2016
Author:
Vinay Punwani

 void addFuel()
